numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that there are more white coaches than black coaches.
2. There is a problem with these graphs.
3. The graphs try to say that racism still exists.
4. The graphs are proportional to the population of America.
5. About 70% of the population of America are people who are not people of color.
6. If about 70% of the population of America are not people of color then there will be more coaches who are not people of color.
7. It is silly to think that there will not be more coaches who are not people of color.
8. I wonder why the NHL was excluded from these graphs.
9. The NHL has few black players.
10. Since 2020, the NHL has about 43 black players.
11. A typical NHL roster consists of 20 players.
12. The NHL has about 620 players.
13. Only 43 NHL players are black.
14. There is no black head coach in the NHL.
15. A person can argue that racism explains this situation.
16. This argument is partially true.
17. Recently, more NHL coaches have been fired from their positions because of accusations of racism.
18. Some accusations of racism were true.
19. I want the graphs to include the NHL.
20. If the graphs include the NHL then people can ask why the NHL has few players who are people of color.
